de.bpmnaftool.control
Class BpmnAfToolImpl

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      de.bpmnaftool.control.BpmnAfToolImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
BpmnAfTool
public class BpmnAfToolImpl
extends java.util.Observable
implements BpmnAfTool

Implementation of BpmnAfTool which is used to initialize and control the application

Author:
Felix Härer

log

public void log(java.lang.String message,
                int indent,
                int lineBreaks)
Description copied from interface: BpmnAfTool
Logs the given message with a simple logger, notifies the view (observer) and prints to stout. Indentation and line breaks are added as specified.

Specified by:
log in interface BpmnAfTool
Parameters:
message - message to log
indent - level of indentation, from 0 on
lineBreaks - insert given number of line breaks after message
